name: Mercury(II) bromide
desc: Mercury(II) bromide or mercuric bromide is the chemical compound composed of mercury and bromine with the formula HgBr2. This white crystalline solid is a laboratory reagent. Like mercury(II) chloride, it is extremely toxic.
Other anions:
Mercury(II) fluoride
Mercury(II) chloride
Mercury(II) iodide
Other cations:

Cadmium bromide
Mercury(I) bromide
